D-O-G#No#I don\'t#Cat#How do you spell "dog"?

anyone#everyone#nobody#no one#Do you know anyone who has a helicopter? No, I don\'t know ______.
gone#put#made#had#I\'m sorry but he\'s already ______.

needn\'t#will#don\'t#won\'t#You ______ shout! I\'m not deaf.
Yes, she can. She speaks Chinese very well.#Yes, she can speaks Chinese.#Yes, she cans.#She can speak the Chinese#Can she speak a foreign language? ______

have to #would#will#shall#To lose weight, you ______ eat less or exercise more.
gets#gotten #was#be#The bathroom never ______ cleaned if I don\'t do it myself.
had known #had known #would have known #known#If she _________ about his financial situation, she would have helped him out.
looking after #looking into #looking at #looking onto#I\'ll be _______________ their cat while they are away on holiday.
do#to do#doing#is doing#He made his children _____ their homework every afternoon.
so#such#as#to#The test was _____ difficult she had problems finishing it on time.
will have finished #finish#will finish #finished#By the time she arrives, we _________________ our homework.
to stick #poking#plunging#puncturing#Marzia expected the doctor ______ a needle in her arm.

string-array.name: final_two
string-array.item: I swam.#I am swimming.#I swim.#I will swim.#What did you do yesterday?

The interviewer was holding the microphone up to his mouth.
